Title: Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares resigns from struggling carmaker
Description: Carlos Tavares is stepping down as Chief Executive Officer of Stellantis following a sharp decline in the carmaker’s sales. A new CEO will be appointed in 2025.

Title: Williams-Sonoma says rivals who lean into discounts are training shoppers to 'wait for that promotion'
Description: Williams-Sonoma CEO Laura Alber said the chain has reduced the number of discounts it offers since they can push customers to delay purchases.
